skillTree.localised_description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: The turbulent Winds of Magic can do little harm to those who have found harmony amidst its raging currents.
The best way to repel the chaotic flurry of missile fire is to meet it with order, discipline, and a stalwart row of shields.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: In which you tell your men not just why they fight, but *how*.
"Your role is quite simple, really. When the assassin strikes, you jump in and beat them senseless."

skillTree.localised_description: "Have the books removed, I have studied enough!"
By carving deliberate grooves in the bullets, a piercing wail can be created as they pass through the air, disorienting the target.

effects.description: "Whistling Rounds" ammunition (reduces melee defence and melee attack)

skillTree.localised_description: "Bring us closer! I must confirm the situation with my own eyes."
Through careful interpretation and vicious introspection, one can subtly shift their purpose as the flow of battle demands.

skillTree.localised_description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Lead with the heart, command with the mind.

skillTree.localised_description: "Send messengers to the front! The right-flank must fight to the last man!"
Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.
Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: All warriors of honour and pride are eager to fight under the Dragon-Emperor's banners.
This leader imparts his knowledge to the battalion, and they are willing to learn.

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: When the arrows are spent and the blades are all blunted, this perfect warrior can rely on their well-trained body to keep death from their door.
Some may consider administration a tiresome process, but this servant of the Celestial Emperor knows that a tidy society makes for an efficient, effective one.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: An inquisitive nature is only part of the skillset required for the Dragon's questioner, tasked with ensuring harmony prevails over Celestial lands.
Fury simmers just barely below the surface, begging to be released.
A person's word should be their bond, and shame on those that would break it.
If knowledge is power, then this one is powerful indeed.
This one could challenge an Ogre to an arm-wrestling match.
If there is anything left to learn about military planning, this one has yet to come across it.
What will not bend may sometimes break.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors
